name: wii-browser-render
description: Screenshot-based web browser for Wii - Render deployment

scripts.build: sh -c "vite build || react-scripts build || next build || parcel build || echo 'no-build'"
scripts.start: sh -c "(next start -p $PORT) || (npx serve -s dist -l $PORT) || (npx serve -s build -l $PORT) || node server.js || echo 'no-start'"
scripts.dev: sh -c "vite || react-scripts start || next dev || parcel serve || node server.js"
